Reviews.Title: Pentax Bundle saves money
Reviews.Author: Renato leon
Reviews.Content: The bundle has everything a amateur photografer needs. It's very practical and the buyer saves quite some money with the bundle. The camera is the best benefit-cost ratio I know. I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great Package Deal
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Marino Jr.
Reviews.Content: Outstanding all around starter kit for someone looking to get into digital photography.  Everything you would need to get started!

Reviews.Title: Great camera and package
Reviews.Author: ACD
Reviews.Content: The Pentax k30 is a solid entry level dslr camera. I bought this recently and it arrived quickly as promised. I was a little bummed that the 18-55mm lens was not weather sealed like the camera (it kind of makes the weather sealing of the camera pointless unless I buy a new lens), but all in all, this kit was a great value.Canon and Nikon are by and large the "top dogs" in this industry. Pentax has always been a step-sibling of sorts with Sony, Samsun, Sigma, etc. chasing behind. While Canon and Nikon do make fantastic cameras, I believe Pentax is setting itself apart in the entry level market. The K30 is evidence of that, providing much more value to the end user. I would recommend this camera and/or kit to anyone looking to buy an entry level DSLR.
